website_summaries.verdict: The SmartBand is an ambitious recipe that needs a little more time in the oven. There are better trackers on the market.
pros: Sony's SmartBand is a lightweight simple device that's easy to set up and has a companion app that's packed with features
It's dust and water proof and has a great battery life
cons: Some tracking results didn't seem overly accurate and some of the features weren't very useful
The design is also a bit bland, and its not great for real fitness junkies

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: No issues at all. I did have to change my phone case though, because the Otterbox case I had was too thick and the NFC between the Smartband and my phone would not communicate. But, once I changed the case, I've had no problems ever since. It's really amazing to see all your daily info; how many steps you take, how much social media you use, how many calories you burn and, for me, how well you sleep. There are tons of features with the Lifelog app and my only wish is that they could make the data you store in the app able to be exported and saved on your PC. Hopefully that will come soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great peice of tech! 5 out of 5!
customer_reviews.text: My main reason for buying this smartband is that it cured one of my biggest habits, I would check my phone for updates every 5 seconds. Thankfully, I can rely on this to vibrate for every single notification I receive. It's step counter counts steps even when I'm sitting down, but even the most expensive smart and can't be 100% accurate. The battery lasts just over 2 days on a 30 minute charge, AMAZING! I'm rating this 5 stars because it does exactly what I bought it for, while also having a few extra features.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Siebert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent band for a Sony Xperia Z2 owner.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and i both have Sony Xperia Z2 smartphones and these bands are awesome. I really dont have anything negative to say as they pair with Sony smart phones flawlessly. It works as intended, and the vibration feature for missed calls, alarms, text etc are the main reason we went with these over the fitbit bands. They track everything we need them too through sony's lifelog app. Battery life is really good it last about 4 days. Ive also showered with it several times with no issues for longer than 15 minutes under continuous water.
customer_reviews.author: D Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Sorry it will not stay connected, logs wrong information, sometimes logs sleep, most times wont log steps or sleep.. I tried resetting it bluetoothing pairing everything.. it has worked properly 2 times thats 2 days since I bought it. It is still on my wrist hoping I MIGHT get lucky.. very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: and the speaker is terrible, I can barely hear the ringer in a ...
customer_reviews.text: The Smartband is a simple addition to my new phone, and assists with the LIFELOG program. I have the Sony Xperia z3 phone, and the speaker is terrible, I can barely hear the ringer in a quiet room, and the Smartband vibrates for notifications, helping me know when I get phone calls and texts,...very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Cool product
customer_reviews.text: Easy and quick optiom to star doing exercises and measure your progress. Just be sure to charge it well before first use or everytime it gets an update.
customer_reviews.author: Juan U.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, simple and amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought 3 smartwatches so far for tracking activity and such. All watches require constant charging, every 2 days or so, this thing goes to 4-5 days and only requires 30 minutes plugged. Amazing. I bathe with it, sleep with it and never take it off. I would recommend it to anyone looking for an activity travker.
customer_reviews.author: PTY_Buyer

customer_reviews.title: A Real Smartband by Sony @ GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Its worth purchasing this band. This is first smartband I own so overall I'm impressed with it. Personally speaking one can go for this band and being a developer in this industry itself I know there are lot of things in market which are ahead of this band but still @ the price what is offered this band servers its features well. Great thing its very lightweight you'll forget that you're even wearing this band. Rest all features are good. It serves all feature for which it is meant for. Only -ve point from my perspective of this band is it supports only Android not iOS (iPhone/iPad/iPod). Overall great product by Sony. You can purchase it.

customer_reviews.title: The app sucks.
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for two weeks. The device no longer charges. Is it worth my time to send it back and get a replacement? doubt it. Chalk another PoS device up for Sony. Pros: Looks decent Cons: Broke after two weeks. It does not track accurately. It's a pain to put on. Broke after two weeks. The app sucks.

It tracked everything you did on your phone and activity wise but I wasn't a fan of the app style. It seemed too cluttered for my taste. The band material seemed to really hold onto dust/lint from your clothes also. Easy to clean so not a big deal but made it often look a bit cheap.

It is a very nice product, but it just didn't work out for us.

This is the most comfortable fitness tracker I have used. It has a limited feature set currently (only 2 months old). I think expectations, if tempered, you will be quite happy with it. If, you think this is a full featured fitness tracker currently, move along as you will hate it.

But shortly after,it becomes a part of you...Like a smart extension of you ..and that's the great thing! It's comfortable and you don't have to remove it at all! You can control power point presentations, control your music player, activate your phone camera, ....using the band (and the smart connect app). Great band!!

Sadly, given that I can not use the Smartband, I am being forced to return it. Too, bad, because it would have completed my Sony electronic collection. I have informed the seller to note this important bit of information.

customer_reviews.title: No Support Available as of April 4th from Sony
customer_reviews.text: Quick heads up - I purchased this through Amazon and was very disappointed to find that it hasn't been "officially" released yet so there is NO support, apps, etc from Sony. Mine is still sitting in the packaging waiting for Sony to release the Lifelog app and my carrier to release Android 4.4 ... Buyer beware. I would suggest waiting for Sony and the carriers to get their act together before purchasing. Some of the carriers in Asia are bundling the SmartBand free with their new phones.
customer_reviews.author: Inge622

customer_reviews.title: Sony Smartband SWR10 Gets a 10
customer_reviews.text: The Sony Smartband SWR10 is perfect for its usefulness and simplicity. It's easy to set up, and slim. What I like most are the sleep and cell phone proximity functions. It not only graphs your sleep hours - it shows the time periods you were in deep sleep. Pretty interesting. And, it alerts you when you've distanced yourself from your phone, so you pick it up before it's lost or stolen. For someone like me who only wants to track sleep and exercise it's very nice and all you need.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Works Great With Xperia Z1
customer_reviews.text: Although the Smartband works with KitKat Android's, but works best with the latest Sony Xperia devices (Z Ultra, Z1, Z1 Compact, Z2.) Hopefully, T-Mobile USA will release 4.4 to the Z1s. Until then, the Smartband will not work with the Flagship device. The new Lifelog app update now includes Bicycle Riding and Transportation times. FYI.. this new Lifelog update only works with Xperia devices. Since this is the first time I'm using a fitness/Smartband tracker, I really can't give a comparison with other fitness bands (Fitbit, Fuel Band, etc.)

customer_reviews.title: Useful

I used to always open my bag and check my phone but after getting this, i don't have to, i only check it once it vibrates to let me know i have received something. It would have been much better if there was a difference on how it vibrates so i would know which one is which, anyway, i recommend getting this!

customer_reviews.title: Love being able to put the phone down and still know what's going on.

But I wanted to write this review so people considering to buy this Smartband know that you need to make sure your phone is compatible. I had the Sony Z1s from Tmobile and it didn't have the most up to date update and the smartband didn't work with it. It is not for every phone. Make sure it will work with your phone before you buy this.

customer_reviews.title: It's quite useless apart from the smart alarm
customer_reviews.text: After 3 weeks, I can live without it. It's quite useless apart from the smart alarm. You won't care about the lifelog at all after a while. The fact you need to put night and day mode by yourself is very irritating as if you forget it won't register your hours of sleep. Registering the run and walk is very accurate even on a trademile. I tried to love this product, but honestly I will invest into a smartwatch (moto 360) because this thing just do too little.
customer_reviews.author: Nono

customer_reviews.title: Does not accurately measure activities -- and isn't that the whole point?
customer_reviews.text: It took less than 24 hours to decide that this band was not worth the money. Pros: - Comfortable to wear - Looks great - Some nice features (like vibrating with incoming calls/texts) Cons: - It does not accurately measure activities. Enough said. I don't know if it's the band itself or the app associated with it that was the problem, but the whole point (for me) of this band was to measure activity. It seemed to think i was engaging in transportation all night instead of sleeping, and it was way off on the step counts as compared with another app i've used for a long time and found to be very accurate. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.text: Good overall. No GPS, so can't give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dlugosch

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product is goog but have few services, spect more services
customer_reviews.author: Yamur Saiz

customer_reviews.title: disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Always looking forward to a purchase of a Sony product. Sony wrote the book on top of the line. This falls way short. When it works this is a wonderful product, and I don't have a Sony phone so maybe this works better with them but I do have one that meets the spec Notification works sometimes., sleep mode wake up doesn't work. but the most annoying is it is constantly disconnecting three to four times a day. Very annoying and it doesn't reconnect itself I have to go in and figure it out sometimes it's a quick fix other times it's almost a guessing game. Trying to like it but it's not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: alrte10

customer_reviews.title: Sony Smartband Tracks Your Phone - Not You
customer_reviews.text: I have already stopped using this. The app is not the greatest, and the tracking part was spotty at best. I have used the FitBit Force, Sony Smartband, and now the Jawbone UP24. Worst = Sony, Best = Jawbone. This unit is really designed tyo be used with a Sony phone, and mainly for tracking what you do with the phone (logs your internet time, time in email, time in games, etc). Not what I was looking for. Initial bluetooth setup with Galaxy S4 was a pain also. Don't follow their directions, goggle how to and there are better ways. Connection gets lost. Just trying to save you (and others) some money. Good luck
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: not really sure how it calculates step. Interesting to play with
customer_reviews.author: Phil Ingwell

customer_reviews.title: I confess that it was my mistake to don`t look ...
customer_reviews.text: I confess that it was my mistake to don`t look right for the advertsiment. I thought i could see the hours on the brand. But now i noticed that i can`t, pus, some apps don`t work right and my cell ponhe is a sony. If i could replace or see another way to help each other i would be very thankful.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Borges

customer_reviews.title: Even 1 star is high!
customer_reviews.text: Not accurate software. To let the SmartBand knows, you have to push the button. If you leave it on a desk whole nite, it will tell you you slept whole nite in deep sleep, which is so ridiculous. For instance, this morning, I did not turn it on to day mode, and I started running. It shows that I am sleeping during my running time. It does not measure your pulse and does not calculate based on that. It is not necessary to purchase it. You can also do exact same thing as free. Just download an app like map my run, or any other apps. Those are works better.
customer_reviews.author: tugba

product_meta.title: Sony Mobile SWR10 SmartBand Activity Tracking Wristband - Black
product_meta.description:
LOG YOUR DAY. EVERY DAY. INTRODUCING THE SONY SMARTBAND SWR10 LIFE LOGGING ACCESSORY WITH NOTIFICATION ALERT AND MUSIC REMOTE
Sony’s SmartWear lets you stay on top of things that matter. It interacts with your Smartphone or tablet and lets you see your life as you live it. The SmartBand is an innovative life logging wrist band that enables you to keep track of everything you do – your movements, your communications and your entertainment. Wearable technology for wherever you go, around the clock. Log special moments and watch your life played back to you on your Android Smartphone or tablet.

Lifelog Android app that automatically records your physical, social and entertainment activitiesView larger Technological advances include NFC connectivity for one-touch pairingView larger TRACK MOVEMENTS, COMMUNICATIONS AND ENTERTAINMENT
With its removable core containing advanced sensor technology, the Sony SmartBand SWR10 feels your movements and sends the data to your Smartphone. But what makes the SmartBand really smart is the innovative Lifelog Android app that automatically records your physical, social and entertainment activities. With the Lifelog app, you can see how active you were, where you went, what pictures you took, where and when, and how you’ve been communicating with your world during any given day. For instance, the Lifelog app knows if you’ve been running, walking and how you’ve slept. It counts steps, calculates speed, and can even monitor your sleep pattern and wake you up when you’ve slept enough according to your sleep cycle. By tracking body movements, it calculates and measures the best time to wake you up and gently vibrates to bring you out of sleep.


This innovative life logging app will also help you set daily goals, monitor your progress and challenge your all-time bests. Look ahead in time to understand just how much more you need to run to achieve your daily activity goal. Moreover, Lifelog lets you know what the weather is going to be like tomorrow and days after. When a call, message, Facebook update or other notification comes in, SmartBand will vibrate gently on your wrist to let you know. It also has LED indicators which light up to show that SmartBand is active. You’ll never miss a thing.

DISCOVER JUST HOW MUCH YOU LIVE, HAVE COMPLETE CONTROL OF YOUR LIFE
Special moments need special attention. At any time of any day, when you press the Life Bookmark key on your SmartBand, everything going on at that moment will be caught and remembered forever. Which means you can see how much you were communicating with your friends, what was said, when and how. The Lifelog app collects all your camera and music activities and presents them in a fun and animated interface along with your activity. On any day, you can see the pictures and videos you took; the games you played; the music you were listening to and how long you listened to it for. You can look back on your life and your journey through it. Giving you complete control over every aspect of your life, GPS enables you to see where you’ve been – from a restaurant you visited to the location of a photo – and an edit function lets you write your own personal comment into each Life Bookmark. What’s more, when you’re enjoying your music on the move, you can tap the band to play, pause and skip tracks.

SEAMLESS CONNECTION, GREAT DESIGN
In constant contact with your Smartphone via Bluetooth and to the cloud via your Smartphone, you can be assured of an always up to date activity log. Connecting is easy using NFC or a standard Bluetooth connecting procedure. When you go out of range (up to 10 m) of your Smartphone, a gentle vibrating SWR10 alert will let you know. So you never forget your phone. And even when you’re out of range, this wearable technology saves information about what you do and automatically passes it on when you re-connect. You can go running and SmartBand will add your performance to Lifelog app when you’re home. Incorporating a removable core unit and a stylish and comfortable wristband, the SmartBand is a 24/7 wearable device. Discreet and waterproof, you can keep it with you whatever you do. With a range of vibrant colours and styles to choose from, it’s designed to look great with any clothing style and an iconic metal Sony fastening button and LEDs give it a premium look and feel.

Innovative wrist band that keeps track of your movements, communications and entertainmentView larger ABOUT SONY MOBILE AND SMARTWEAR
SmartWear – a new product category from Sony. Log your life with SmartWear. Innovation is at the heart of everything Sony creates. By designing devices that seamlessly and intelligently interact with each other, Sony makes smart living easy and accessible. SmartWear is the way forward. And Sony is leading the way. Using ground-breaking design, Sony Mobile continues to introduce new technologies and has the largest range of NFC accessories available from wireless headsets to portable speakers, TVs, SmartTags and smartwatches.


SPECIFICATIONS:
 * Requirements: Android 4.4, Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energy (BLE), Lifelog app, Smart Connect app
 * Waterproof IP58 rated* (*In compliance with IP58, SmartBand SWR10 is protected against the ingress of dust and is waterproof. The SmartBand SWR10 can be kept under 3 metres of freshwater for up to 30 minutes.)
 * Life Bookmark key
 * Notifications
 * Media remote (tap function)
 * Smart alarm
 * Bluetooth
 * NFC pairing/connecting
 * Micro USB (charging)
 * Indicators: 3 white LED



BOX CONTAINS
100
feature_bullets: SmartBand SWR10 and Lifelog Android app support devices running Android 4.4 and later
When a call or message comes in, the SmartBand gently vibrates on your wrist to let you know
Bookmark your special moments by pressing the Life Bookmark key
